name: @elucidata/pulse
description: Microscopic signals with automatic dependency tracking.
author: Matthew Mccray

scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && tsup ./src/index.ts ./src/utils.ts ./src/react/index.ts --dts --format esm --minify --external react && bun run stats
scripts.distTSC: rm -rf dist && tsc ./src/index.ts ./src/utils.ts ./src/react/index.ts --outDir dist --strict false -d --skipLibCheck --module esnext --target ES2022 && bun run stats
